item.title: Report E-2024010100
item.description:
Report E-2024010100

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-16T18:13:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-03
  • City: FREDERICKSBURG
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The container arrived at Veolia's 10 Day In-transit facility located at 24 Commerce Parkway, Fredericksburg, VA 22406 on 12/29/2023. As it was transferred from the original delivering vehicle to the outbound vehicle on 1/4/24, a leak was discovered. The material was transferred to another IBC that was UN rated for the material. Investigation revealed that there was a crack directly behind the valve. It was determined that this was most likely caused by freezing due to the weather.
